Title: Establishes a tax deduction for distributions from a family tuition account established under the New York state college choice tuition savings program used to pay student loans
Summary: Establishes a tax deduction for distributions from a family tuition account established under the New York state college choice tuition savings program used to pay student loans.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a tax deduction for distributions from a family tuition account established under the New York state college choice tuition savings program used to pay student loans
